page.title: 14COWDALE HALL FARM
page.content: The farm owns 150 acres of land and rents 60 acres from{ICI.}It also owns 90 milk cows,80 young-stock cows from ages of 2-days to 2\-months.They also own 70 sheep for meat,90 sows,5 boars and 600-700 white pigs mainly used for meat.The milk cows are milked twice a day once at 6.00am and once at 4.00pm with{automatic machinery. The farmer gets up at 5.30am and finshes at 6.00pm. The farmer grows no crops except grass which is used for sileage in Winter.{The farm suffered {from BLAST-SHOCK when the Old Quarry {was in use,Stones fell through the {roof and some glass shatterd.} The farmer employs 2 workers a year- one is a student and the other is the farmer's father.The family has owned the farm for over 100 years but the farm itself is much older.
